Posts.Content: Ilonas wrote: hai all, Hope to have some anwers here, because I am from holland and seems very difficult to find anything on this subject. I was dx this january with TN breastcancer stage 1 19mm tumor. Went trought chemo 16x and than surgery. Expexting to have a cpr but left with 2mm. My dr was happy with this results.. and so was I. But now I received a phonecall from the hospital about xeloda and having better survival rates then? Now I am scarred.... can anyone help me out here... Thanks doe responding... Regards ilona Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Xeloda for small rest tumor triple negative? Ilonas Frog-on-the-lilypad
